Metadata: An Effective Combination Trawl for West Coast Draggers: Atlantic-​Western Trawls (revised)
Oregon State University (OSU) Sea Grant College Program
ORESU-​TL-​74-​001; OSU Agricultural Experiment Station Bulletin 613

This publication describes the modification, rigging, and fishing of an effective combination otter trawls on the Pacific Northwest Coast by several Oregon otter trawlers. The trawls were designed by Captain Wes Johnson ad were modified slightly and rigged by Captain Fred Anderson and the author over a three year period.
